name: Lulu
description: I am a Rhodesian ridgeback, if you know anything about my breed you will know I am very intelligent. I learn very quickly. I would make a great family pet as long as there are no cats in the house, I donâ€™t like them very much. I do well with other dogs

name: Zazu
description: I am the white and tabby cat! If you are looking for the best kitty, no need to look any further. I love everything in life. I love people, cats and dogs. I love giving humans hugs and telling them about my day. I am a 4 year old neutered male and would love to find my fur-ever humans and family soon as I just have so much love to give. Please be my best friend and take me home!

name: Aubrey
description: I enjoy getting pet and laying your lap I also love when they let me out to roam and the sink is on a trickle and I can stick my paw under the water! So if you could open your heart and home I would love to be your buddy, please let it be my day to have a home soon!
